name: Electro Hypostasis
desc:
Electro Hypostasis

Code name: Aleph. A high-purity Electro entity.

Even if you win at rock-paper-scissors, Aleph is not one to admit defeat.

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.text: Can also be exchanged using a

customize.name: Blank Dynamic Card
customize.desc: A blank card with a painted back. It is said that if you put the name of your desired dynamic card on this blank card, you can get the very skin from the Association agent located at the tavern.

customize.text: Tavern Challenge: Friendly Fracas - Electro Hypostasis's Whisper

<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Meow." "Our senses are very sharp, and when danger approaches, we can practically 'hear' the sound of incoming trouble. As such, all us cats tend to avoid those purplish, square-shaped fellows!"
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: "Electro Hypostasis" is immune to Frozen, Stun, Petrification and begins with "Elemental Lifeform: Electro" attached to it. It will heal until it reaches 6 HP upon triggering "Electro Crystal Core." At the start of the Action Phase: If the Elector Hypostasis does not have "Electro Crystal Core" attached, it can reapply "Electro Crystal Core." (This effect can be triggered twice at most.)</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.text: Tavern Challenge: Serious Showdown - Electro Hypostasis's Bellow

<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Meow." "After those purplish, square-shaped things wake form their slumber, they always start emitting a crackling sound that is loud enough to hurt our ears. I don't think humans seem to be able to hear it, however..."
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: "Electro Hypostasis" is immune to Frozen, Stun, Petrification and begins with "Elemental Lifefrom: Electro" attached to it. It will heal until it reaches 10 HP upon triggering "Electro Crystal Core." If the Elector Hypostasis does not have "Electro Crystal Core" attached, it can reapply "Electro Crystal Core." (This effect can be triggered twice at most.)</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Absorbing Prism
customize.desc:
Electro Hypostasis: Absorbing Prism

"Here's our chance!"

"Hey, it's on our side!"

customize.text:
<color=#ffffffd9>Prerequisite</color>
Reach Player Level 8
Complete 3 challenge objective(s) in Electro Hypostasis's Whisper

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

desc.text:
<color=#ffd780>Elemental Skill</color>
Deals 2 <color=#ffacff>Electro DMG</color> and then separately performs " <color=#ffffff>Prepare Skill</color> " for <color=#ffffff>Rock-Paper-Scissors Combo: Scissors</color> and <color=#ffffff>Rock-Paper-Scissors Combo: Pape</color> r.
<color=#ece5d8>Rock-Paper-Scissors Combo: Scissors</color>
<color=#ffd780>Elemental Skill</color>
Deals 2 <color=#ffacff>Electro DMG</color> , then performs " <color=#ffffff>Prepare Skill</color> " for <color=#ffffff>Rock-Paper-Scissors Combo: Paper</color> .
<color=#ffffff>Rock-Paper-Scissors Combo: Paper</color>
<color=#ffd780>Elemental Skill</color>
Deals 3 <color=#ffacff>Electro DMG</color> .

<color=#ffd780>Elemental Burst</color>
Deals 2 <color=#ffacff>Electro DMG</color> , summoning <color=#ffffff>Chains of Warding Thunder</color> .

<color=#ffd780>Passive Skill</color>
(Passive) When the battle begins, this character gains an <color=#ffffff>Electro Crystal Core</color> .
<color=#ece5d8>Electro Crystal Core</color>
<color=#ffd780>Status</color>
<color=#ffffff>When the character to which this is attached would be defeated</color> : Remove this effect, ensure the character <color=#ffffff>will not be defeated</color> , and heal them to 1 HP.
<color=#ece5d8>Immunity to Defeat</color>
Certain effects will grant characters an <color=#ffffff>immunity to being defeated</color> when their HP hits 0, and will heal them for a certain amount thereafter.
When this occurs, characters will not be regarded as having experienced a <color=#ffffff>defeat</color> . (Hence, their attached equipment and statuses will not be removed, and their Energy will remain uncleared.)

<color=#ffd780>Summon</color>
<color=#ffffff>End Phase</color> : Deal 1 <color=#ffacff>Electro DMG</color> .
<color=#ffffff>Usage(s): 2</color>
<color=#ffffff>When this Summon is on the field</color> : Your opponent will have to spend 1 additional Elemental Die when performing "Switch Character." (Once per Round)

Applies Electro and can trigger the following Elemental Reactions:
[ <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> + <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Overloaded</color> : DMG +2 for this instance, the target is forcibly switched to the next character
[ <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> + <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Superconduct</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, deal 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters except the target
[ <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> + <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Electro-Charged</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, deal 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters except the target
[ <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> + <color=#99ff88>Dendro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Quicken</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [ <color=#ffffff>Catalyzing Field</color> ] that grants +1 DMG to the next 2 instances of Dendro or Electro DMG

<color=#ece5d8>Prepare Skill</color>
Some Skills cannot be used directly. Instead, they need to be <color=#ffffff>prepared</color> over a certain number of turns.
When it is a certain player's turn, and this player's active character is currently <color=#ffffff>preparing</color> a Skill, this player's turn will be skipped. If the Skill has finished being <color=#ffffff>prepared</color> , the character will directly use that Skill at this time. (Skills that require <color=#ffffff>preparing</color> cannot activate effects triggered by "using a Skill" or "triggering an Elemental Reaction" or other such effects.)
Only active characters can <color=#ffffff>prepare</color> Skills, and if an active character who is <color=#ffffff>preparing</color> a Skill gets switched off-field, their <color=#ffffff>preparation</color> will be interrupted.
<color=#ece5d8>Usage(s)</color>
After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#ffffff>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.
This card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#ffffff>Usages</color> remaining.

value.text: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with Electro Hypostasis

value.name: Electro Hypostasis
value.desc:
Code name: Aleph. A high-purity Electro entity.
Elemental hypostases are the highest forms of elemental structures, usually formed either at a location bursting with elemental energy or at a clogged ley line.
Elemental hypostases have developed various attacks based on their elemental attributes.
